Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Enacts into law components of legislation relating to reducing greenhouse gas emissions in construction
Summary: Enacts into law components of legislation relating to reducing greenhouse gas emissions in construction; enacts the "building embodied carbon breakthrough act"; provides a sales tax exemption for certain low-carbon building materials (Part A); establishes a grant program for manufacturers of concrete for environmental product declarations (Part B); expands eligibility for commercial property assessed clean energy financing resources (Part C).
LawCode: Amd §1115, Tax L; amd §§119-ff & 119-gg, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a sales tax exemption for certain low-carbon building materials (Part A); to establish a grant program for manufacturers of concrete for environmental product declarations (Part B); and to amend the general municipal law, in relation to expanding eligibility for commercial property assessed clean energy financing resources (Part C)
